altername_name: Kidou Senshi Z Gundam: Kouhen Sora wo Kakeru
Kidou Senshi Z Gundam: Kouhen Uchuu o Kakeru
name: Kidou Senshi Z Gundam: Kouhen Uchuu wo Kakeru
overview: Kidou Senshi Z Gundam ~Kouhen Sora wo Kakeru~ (機動戦士Ｚガンダム　後編　宇宙を駆ける) is a Shoot-em-up game, published by BANDAI, which was released in Japan in 1997 for the Sega Saturn.
